code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import apiClient from"../api/apiClient";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Publishers(){const[name,setName]=useState("");const[pubs,setPubs]=useState([]);const fetchPubs=async()=>{const res=await apiClient.get("/publishers");setPubs(res.data);};const createPublisher=async()=>{if(!name)return alert("Enter name");const res=await apiClient.post("/publishers",{name});alert("\u2705 Publisher created.
